species.name: ekans
descriptions: An EKANS curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. This position allows it to quickly respond to an enemy from any direction with a threat from its upraised head.
A very common sight in grassland, etc. It flicks its tongue in and out to sense danger in its surroundings.
By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.
It always hides in grass. When first born, it has no poison, so its bite is painful, but harmless.
It can freely detach its jaw to swallow large prey whole. It can become too heavy to move, however.

abilities.name: intimidate
abilities.effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

abilities.name: shed-skin
abilities.effect: Has a 33% chance of curing any major status ailment after each turn.

abilities.name: unnerve
